description:
There`s a new transfer student in Natsumi`s class.  She`s very athletic and acts like a ninja girl.  But when she hears Natsumi talking with her brother about their "stupid frogs" at home, she knows exactly what they mean.  She has a frog of her own: Dororo!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dororo Wasurerareta Senshi de Arimasu / Dororo and Koyuki Youshou wa Utsukushiki Kana de Arimasu
Dororo, le guerrier oublié / La troupe au complet ?
ドロロ忘れられた戦士 であります / ドロロ&小雪友情は美しき哉 であります
